name: F'root Beatja
description:
How to play :

Your ninja will dash in direction of your mouse in rythm and cut all expanding roots in his way. But if roots are not cut fast enough, they will get hard and become walls that the ninja must not dash into !

Cut as many roots as you can before dashing into a wall !

If you manage to cut 2 roots in a row, your scissors will get on fire ! Allowing you to cut the next wall you dash through !

Global Game Jam 2023 sumbmission (Theme : Roots)

Credits : 

Matteo "Strublar" Daluz - Developer

François "Imberbus" Meier - Developer
